entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 8:10 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.7°C
Wind: E 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
